front.title: The ANTACID Replication Service: Protocol and Algorithms

abstract.t: This memo specifies the protocol and algorithms of the ANTACID Replication Service, designed to replicate hierarchically named repositories of XML documents for business-critical, internetworked applications. ASCII and HTML versions of this document are available at http://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz-antacid- protocol.txt and http://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz- antacid-protocol.html, respectively.
